forced_march.name: Forced March
forced_march.description: Choose one Column. Perform an Advance action in that Column. This does not count as your one Column action for the Logistics Phase.

supply_drop.name: Supply Drop
supply_drop.description: Draw 2 cards from your deck. If this puts you over the Hand Limit of 7, you must immediately discard down to 7.

industrial_sabotage.name: Industrial Sabotage
industrial_sabotage.description: Choose an opponent's face-down asset in their Rear (Depot) or Reserve line. The opponent must immediately discard that asset.

rapid_deployment.name: Rapid Deployment
rapid_deployment.description: Choose one friendly asset in your Reserve line and move it to the Front. The asset becomes Exposed. If it has an 'Activate:' ability, you may resolve it immediately.

battlefield_recon.name: Battlefield Recon
battlefield_recon.description: Reveal all face-down assets in your opponent's Reserve and Rear lines. These assets remain face-up until they are moved or discarded.

munitions_reserve.name: Munitions Reserve
munitions_reserve.description: Choose a friendly Heavy asset at the Front. Immediately place one 'Aim,' 'Load,' or 'Preparation' token on that card.
